lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Hahn declined to comment directly on reports that 1986 losses at Spanish subsidiary Sociedad Espanola de Automoviles de Turismo (SEAT) totalled up to 27 billion pesetas or that these losses were twice as high as expected.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: VW, which traditionally releases its annual results in April or May, said last week 1986 profit and dividend would both be unchanged despite the need to make provision to cover the possible loss of 480 mln marks from allegedly fraudulent hedging operations.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Wolfgang Lincke, head of car development at VW, said the increasing environmental awareness of West German consumers would allow VW to sell more "higher value" cars in future containing equipment such as catalytic converters, which cut exhaust emissions.
